title: Nome (ish) exepdition
body: Hey hoover, checking in if youre still up for the expedition. They moved the local from Nome to a ghost town like, 50 sth miles east there instead (towns called Bluff - I cant find anything about it so chances are you wont as well, but as usual, Im prepared to be surprised) so you dont need to worry about whatever situation there you were trying to avoid there.    Anyway, I heard that Francis is going as well so you know :)    Get back to me asap, looking forward to our joint experiment on Thursday!

title: Bluff Expedition
body: Heres the list of attendance that you asked for.    Madision Jonhson    Perry Orchard    Sophie Miller    William Yazzie    Francis Morgan    Warren Rice

title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Dude did you catch the breach yesterday night? Managed to track the address to a remote location in Ruby??? Been there once on a hunting trip with a friend, and that's about all that I know. We should go shooting tooting at some point btw :)    Anyhow, fix up the thing man. Higher-ups been on my ass about it the entire morning :/

title: New login?
body: Hey, just checking in... You apparently logged in around the same time yesterday, was that like actually you ,':/
